@siddarthpaim That’s Nylon Khaman. Moong Dal Khaman and Dhokla are different. Non-Gujaratis often mistake Khaman with Dhokla & vice-versa.

Here is the “DHOKLA” (ढोकळा).
Unfortunately, real Dhokla are not sold in market restaurants. Khaman (also popularly known as Khaman-Dhokla) are sold as Dhokla.
You can make yourself or have it at a Gujarati’s home.
https://t.co/OnlPJzsjgg
